law.catch_line: Specific duties of limited conservator or conservator.

text.section: In addition to the duties and powers listed in subsection (1) of this section, the court may assign to a limited conservator any of the duties and powers listed in KRS 387.700 which the partially disabled person lacks the ability to perform.

law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 20, effective July 1, 1982.
